weapons.name: Dagger
weapons.description: A small thin metal weapon. Stick 'em with the pointy end.

weapons.name: Hammer
weapons.description: A thick blunt metal object with a tiny handle. That's what she said...

weapons.name: Wooden Sword
weapons.description: A mid-sized sword made of a solid wood. It is not very sharp but I don't want to get hit by it.

weapons.name: Iron Sword
weapons.description: A mid-sized cast iron sword. The quality is questionable but it will work.

weapons.name: Bow
weapons.description: A curved wood with a string attached..
